job description:
Qualifications:
  • Bachelor’s degree and minimum of 5 years experience in an analytical field
  • Proficiency in analysis tools (SQL, R, Pandas, etc.).
  • Proficiency in one or more programming languages (Python, Java, C++, Ruby, Perl, etc).
Preferred qualifications:
  • Understanding of SIP protocol and/or having experience with data analysis with telephony platforms

Job Responsibilities
Key Responsibilities
  • Lead analysis works by leveraging extensive data from user interaction metrics, call metrics, user feedback to categorize and generalize potential quality issues with the problem and provide actionable solutions.
  • Owns the product’s data collection pipeline, ensure instrumentations are connected reliably and correctly.
  • Create meaningful metrics dashboards by writing database languages queries and/or setting up data aggregation scripts.

Department/Project Description
This opportunity requires working with product, support and user feedback data, analyzing user interaction metrics and data signals to provide data-driven strategic recommendations further improve product quality and improve user experience.

You will need to be a self-starter and demonstrate success in using analytics to drive the understanding, progression and excellence in product. You will need a strong sense of data analytical skill, technical aptitude to connect the metrics with the operation, and strong communication/collaboration skills to work with engineers and product managers.
- provided by Dice

SQL, R Programming, Python
